recipes.title: Breast Pepper Water
recipes.notes: Typed recipe with extensive handwritten annotations (doubled quantities for drumstick/chicken variant, coconut powder note)

recipes.title: John's Green Masala Curry
recipes.notes: Fully handwritten. Serevent notepad. Includes beans at the end.

recipes.title: Dosais
recipes.notes: Top section of a page with 3 recipes. Short recipe.

recipes.title: Brinjal or Ladies Fingers Fried
recipes.notes: Middle section of multi-recipe page. Clearest in the closeup image.

recipes.title: Fish Curry
recipes.notes: Handwritten. Different angle shots of same page. Title at top, ingredients then method.

recipes.title: Pepper Water
recipes.notes: Typed with handwritten annotations (Mix with Water, Then Boil, Cups). 4 near-identical shots.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry (Handwritten)
recipes.notes: Detailed handwritten recipe. Drumsticks or Breast. Full ingredients and method on one page.

recipes.title: Ball Curry
recipes.notes: 2-page handwritten recipe. Page 1: curry base with mince. Page 2: making the meatballs and finishing.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry (Typed)
recipes.notes: Short typed recipe. 'Make in the usual way.'

recipes.title: Cocunut Fish or Prawn Curry
recipes.notes: Typed. Clean and clear. 3 near-identical shots.

recipes.title: Aubergine / Brinjal Fry
recipes.notes: Handwritten. Also notes it can be done with ladies fingers (okra).

recipes.title: My Green Masala Bryani
recipes.notes: 3-page handwritten recipe. Page 1: green masala paste + start of curry. Page 2: cooking chicken, adding spices, rice. Page 3: Bryani assembly with ghee/layering, oven instructions.

recipes.title: Prawn Balchow
recipes.notes: Typed. Detailed recipe with 100 dried prawns. Long method section.

recipes.title: Pepper Water (Handwritten)
recipes.notes: Handwritten version of Pepper Water. Uses ball tamarind instead of paste. Different proportions.

recipes.title: John's 3 Bean Curry
recipes.notes: Short variant recipe at bottom of Bryani page 3. Halve the Bryani quantities, add 3 types of beans.
